text: Lo Siento may refer to: * "Lo Siento" (Belinda Peregrín song), 2003 * "Lo Siento" (Super Junior song), 2018 single featuring Leslie Grace and Play-N- Skillz * "Lo Siento", a song by the band formerly known as Sombrero Verde from their eponymous album, 1981 * "Lo Siento/Forgive Me", a song by the American band C-Note, 2007
title: Lo Siento
